hero.title: Professional Warehouse Solutions
hero.subtitle: Efficient storage, reliable logistics, and comprehensive distribution services for your business needs

mainPart.title: Welcome to Kazan Warehouse
mainPart.subtitle: We provide modern solutions in the field of responsible storage in a warehouse.

service-1.title: All types of loading and unloading operations
service-1.desc-1: We perform a full range of loading and unloading services using both manual labor and specialized equipment.
service-1.desc-2: Our team ensures fast, safe, and accurate handling of goods during receiving, shipping, and movement.
service-1.desc-3: We handle any packaging: pallets, boxes, and individual items.
service-1.desc-4: The temperature regime is maintained at all stages of unloading.
service-1.desc-5: Operations are carried out using reach trucks, hydraulic carts and other modern equipment.

service-2.title: Address storage using modern racking equipment
service-2.desc-1: We offer targeted warehousing using multi-tier shelving systems. This approach ensures quick access to each item and maximum efficiency of warehouse space.
service-2.adv-3: Possibility of piece and pallet accounting
service-2.adv-4: Accounting by expiration dates and series

service-3.title: Mechanized docking system
service-3.desc-1: We organize cross-docking—the rapid transfer of goods from incoming to outgoing shipments without long-term storage.
service-3.feat-2: Movement between zones without intermediate storage
service-3.feat-4: Minimizing transport downtime and reducing costs

service-4.title: Packaging, sorting, rejection
service-4.desc-1: We provide a full range of services for packaging, sorting, and culling goods.
service-4.desc-2: Our specialists ensure visual inspection, assembly, and preparation of products for shipment.
service-4.inc-1: Checking the integrity, markings and quality of packaging
service-4.inc-2: Sorting products manually and using machinery
service-4.inc-3: Identification and removal of defective or expired goods

about.title: About the Company
about.intro-1: Welcome on behalf of our company specializing in secure storage. We are pleased to announce a major expansion of our capabilities and the start of construction on a modern 2.5-hectare warehouse complex.
about.intro-2: The first phase of construction is a freezer warehouse with temperatures ranging from -18°C to -25°C. The second phase is a general-purpose warehouse without temperature control.
about.intro-3: We are confident that our new warehouse complex will be a reliable and efficient solution for your business. We invite you to collaborate!
about.logistics-1: Our company is located in the M-7 Shali Industrial Park, one of the largest industrial clusters in the region, covering a total area of 34.5 hectares. The park is designed to accommodate commercial and industrial facilities and features a perimeter fence, a secure area, and 24-hour access control through a checkpoint.
about.logistics-2: The warehouse complex is located on the first line of the M-7 federal highway, providing excellent access and efficient logistics. The site is located at the intersection of important transportation routes:
about.logistics-3: The new M-12 "Vostok" toll road runs nearby, and the Moscow-Beijing highway is also being designed, which significantly increases the strategic importance of this logistics hub.
about.logistics-4: The site also has all the necessary communications and the possibility of further infrastructure expansion.
